remarks: From the union of two functions that agree on the domain overlap, either component can be recovered by restriction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Feb-2015.)
statement: fresaunres1 $p |- ( ( F : A --> C /\ G : B --> C /\ ( F |` ( A i^i B ) ) = ( G |` ( A i^i B ) ) ) -> ( ( F u. G ) |` A ) = F ) $.
